languages.text: "Так точно, Лорд-капитан!" {n}Некоторое время вокс хранит молчание, затем слышатся помехи и мерный голос Вигдис:{/n} "Офицеры авгурной команды провели сканирование станции, однако информация крайне неточна. Команда отмечает неясные волновые искажения, сбивающие показатели приборов".

traits.locale_text: "Так точно, Лорд-капитан!" {n}Некоторое время вокс хранит молчание, затем слышатся помехи и мерный голос Вигдис:{/n} "Офицеры авгурной команды провели сканирование станции, однако информация крайне неточна. Команда отмечает неясные волновые искажения, сбивающие показатели приборов".

languages.text: "Yes, Lord Captain!" {n}The vox remains silent for a while, but then you hear static and Vigdis's measured voice:{/n} "The officers from the augur crew performed a full scan of the station, but the information is imprecise. They note wave distortions of unclear genesis that are throwing off most of the readings."
languages.original_text: "Так точно, Лорд-капитан!" {n}Некоторое время вокс хранит молчание, затем слышатся помехи и мерный голос Вигдис:{/n} "Офицеры авгурной команды провели сканирование станции, однако информация крайне неточна. Команда отмечает неясные волновые искажения, сбивающие показатели приборов".

traits.locale_text: "Aye aye, Lord Captain!" {n}The vox remains silent for a while, but then you hear static and Vigdis's measured voice:{/n} "The officers from the augur crew performed a full scan of the station, but the information is imprecise. They note wave distortions of unclear genesis that throw off most of the readings."

"Aye aye, Lord Captain!" {n}The vox remains silent for a while, but then you hear static and Vigdis's measured voice:{/n} "The officers from the augur crew performed a full scan of the station, but the information is imprecise. They note wave distortions of unclear genesis that throw off most of the readings."

"Aye aye, Lord Captain!" {n}The vox remains silent for a while, but then you hear static and Vigdis's measured voice:{/n} "The officers from the augur crew performed a full scan of the station, but the information is imprecise. They note wave distortions of unclear genesis that are throwing off most of the readings."

"Aye aye, Lord Captain!" {n}The vox remains silent for a while, but then you hear static and Vigdis's measured voice:{/n} "The officers from the augur crew performed a full scan of the station, but the information is imprecise. They note wave distortions of unclear genesis that are throwing off most of the readings."

"Yes, Lord Captain!" {n}The vox remains silent for a while, but then you hear static and Vigdis's measured voice:{/n} "The officers from the augur crew performed a full scan of the station, but the information is imprecise. They note wave distortions of unclear genesis that are throwing off most of the readings."

languages.text: « Oui, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! » {n}Le système-vox reste muet quelques instants, puis vous entendez une vague d'interférences suivie de la voix uniforme de Vigdis :{/n} « Les officiers de l'équipe des augures ont effectué une analyse complète de la station, mais les résultats manquent de précision. Selon eux, les mesures sont perturbées par des distorsions ondulatoires d'origine inconnue. »
languages.original_text: "Yes, Lord Captain!" {n}The vox remains silent for a while, but then you hear static and Vigdis's measured voice:{/n} "The officers from the augur crew performed a full scan of the station, but the information is imprecise. They note wave distortions of unclear genesis that are throwing off most of the readings."

traits.locale_text: « Oui, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! » {n}Le système-vox reste muet quelques instants, puis vous entendez une vague d'interférences suivie de la voix uniforme de Vigdis :{/n} « Les officiers de l'équipe des augures ont effectué une analyse complète de la station, mais les résultats manquent de précision. Selon eux, les mesures sont perturbées par des distorsions ondulatoires d'origine inconnue. »

languages.text: "Jawohl, Lord Captain!" {n}Das Vox bleibt eine Weile stumm, doch dann hörst du Rauschen und Vigdis' gemessene Stimme:{/n} "Die Offiziere der Augurencrew haben die Station vollständig gescannt, doch die Informationen sind ungenau. Sie weisen darauf hin, dass Wellenverzerrungen unbekannten Ursprungs die meisten Daten beeinträchtigen."
languages.original_text: "Yes, Lord Captain!" {n}The vox remains silent for a while, but then you hear static and Vigdis's measured voice:{/n} "The officers from the augur crew performed a full scan of the station, but the information is imprecise. They note wave distortions of unclear genesis that are throwing off most of the readings."

traits.locale_text: "Aye, aye, Lord Captain!" {n}Das Vox bleibt eine Weile stumm, doch dann hörst du Rauschen und Vigdis' gemessene Stimme:{/n} "Die Offiziere der Augurencrew haben die Station vollständig gescannt, doch die Informationen sind ungenau. Sie weisen darauf hin, dass Wellenverzerrungen unbekannten Ursprungs die meisten Daten beeinträchtigen."

"Aye, aye, Lord Captain!" {n}Das Vox bleibt eine Weile stumm, doch dann hörst du Rauschen und Vigdis' gemessene Stimme:{/n} "Die Offiziere der Augurencrew haben die Station vollständig gescannt, doch die Informationen sind ungenau. Sie weisen darauf hin, dass Wellenverzerrungen unbekannten Ursprungs die meisten Daten beeinträchtigen."

languages.text: «¡Entendido, Lord Capitán!». {n}El voco permanece en silencio unos instantes, pero luego escuchas interferencias y la comedida voz de Vigdis:{/n} «Los oficiales de la tripulación de augures han realizado un escaneo completo de la estación, pero la información ha resultado ser imprecisa. Han detectado distorsiones de ondas de origen desconocido que alteran la mayoría de las lecturas».
languages.original_text: "Yes, Lord Captain!" {n}The vox remains silent for a while, but then you hear static and Vigdis's measured voice:{/n} "The officers from the augur crew performed a full scan of the station, but the information is imprecise. They note wave distortions of unclear genesis that are throwing off most of the readings."

traits.locale_text: «¡Entendido, Lord Capitán!». {n}El voco permanece en silencio unos instantes, pero luego escuchas interferencias y la comedida voz de Vigdis:{/n} «Los oficiales de la tripulación de augures han realizado un escaneo completo de la estación, pero la información ha resultado ser imprecisa. Han detectado distorsiones de ondas de origen desconocido que alteran la mayoría de las lecturas».

languages.text: “遵命，舰长大人！”{n}音阵沉默了片刻，随后你听到了静电声与维格迪斯稳重的声音。{/n}“俄歇矩阵班组已经对星站进行了全面扫描，但信息并不精确。他们发现了起源不明的波形扭曲，大部分读数因此失真。”
languages.original_text: "Yes, Lord Captain!" {n}The vox remains silent for a while, but then you hear static and Vigdis's measured voice:{/n} "The officers from the augur crew performed a full scan of the station, but the information is imprecise. They note wave distortions of unclear genesis that are throwing off most of the readings."

traits.locale_text: “遵命，舰长大人！”{n}音阵沉默了片刻，随后你听到了静电声与维格迪斯稳重的声音。{/n}“俄歇矩阵班组已经对星站进行了全面扫描，但信息并不精确。他们发现了起源不明的波形扭曲，大部分读数因此失真。”

languages.text: 「了解です、ロード・キャプテン！」{n}ヴォクスはしばらく沈黙を保つが、やがてノイズ音と共にヴィグディスの落ち着いた声が聞こえてきた。{/n}「スキャナークルーの士官がステーションを徹底的にスキャンしましたが、得られた情報は不明瞭です。波動のディストーションが原因不明に発生して、ほとんどの測定値を狂わせたとのことです」
languages.original_text: "Yes, Lord Captain!" {n}The vox remains silent for a while, but then you hear static and Vigdis's measured voice:{/n} "The officers from the augur crew performed a full scan of the station, but the information is imprecise. They note wave distortions of unclear genesis that are throwing off most of the readings."

traits.locale_text: 「了解です、ロード・キャプテン！」{n}ヴォクスはしばらく沈黙を保つが、やがてノイズ音と共にヴィグディスの落ち着いた声が聞こえてきた。{/n}「スキャナークルーの士官がステーションを徹底的にスキャンしましたが、得られた情報は不明瞭です。波動のディストーションが原因不明に発生して、ほとんどの測定値を狂わせたとのことです」

languages.text: "Başüstüne Lord Kaptan!" {n}Voks bir süre sessiz kalıyor, ardından parazit sesiyle birlikte Vigdis'in ölçülü sesi yükseliyor.{/n} "Alamet mürettebatının subayları, istasyonun tamamını taradı ancak elde edilen bilgiler muğlak. Belirsiz oluşumlardan kaynaklı bozunum dalgalarının, okumalarının çoğunun belirginliğini yitirmesine sebep olduğunu söylüyorlar."
languages.original_text: "Yes, Lord Captain!" {n}The vox remains silent for a while, but then you hear static and Vigdis's measured voice:{/n} "The officers from the augur crew performed a full scan of the station, but the information is imprecise. They note wave distortions of unclear genesis that are throwing off most of the readings."
